comment._content: Midkiff: www.baseball-reference.com/bullpen/Ezra_Midkiff Assuming this is 1913, this would have been the Yankees' first year as the Yankees.

comment.author: 16432037@N05
comment._content: rjones - correct, 1913 was the year that The New York Highlanders were renamed The New York Yankees. Midkiff played 3rd base.
